history.proof: intros a b c d H1 H2. qauto use: Rplus_comm, Rplus_le_compat, Rplus_assoc.

original: intros a b c d H1 H2. apply Rplus_le_reg_r with (r:=c) in H2. rewrite Rplus_assoc. rewrite (Rplus_comm b c). rewrite <- Rplus_assoc. rewrite (Rplus_comm c d). rewrite <- Rplus_assoc. apply Rplus_le_compat_l. apply H2.
